translation.requestLifetimeLegend: Please help us keep your data up to date. The request can be renewed at any time. Choose how long you can wait. Delete the request if it is no longer relevant.
translation.gettingLocationMessage: We're trying to get your location.
translation.gettingLocationError: Failed to get your location. Default values are used.
translation.geolocationDisabled: No access to geolocation. Please enable it on your device and try again.
translation.radiusInKm: Maximum distance from me: {{ radius }} km
translation.mapUsage: Click bottom left button on the screen. It sets the starting point (red mark) to your curent position (you might have to allow it on your device). Move the green mark to the point of your destination. It's not required to select apecific street address, just place the mark in vicinity of your destination.
translation.requestAdded: Your request has been added! Please wait.
translation.withBaggageRefugeeOption1: Not much (everything fits in a passenger car)
translation.withBaggageRefugeeOption2: Need a bigger car (a vehicle that can take more luggage)
translation.withBaggageRefugeeOption3: Need to deliver cargo (need a truck)
translation.contactData: How to contacting me (and any additional information):
translation.contactDataPlaceholder: Enter your phone number, accounts in messengers or any other contact information. Describe your shipment (if delivery).
translation.driverRouteDeviation: I am available to deviate from the route by {{deviation}} km
translation.seatsInMyCar: Number of available seats in my car:
translation.luggage: How much luggage I can carry:
translation.iHavePassengerCar: I have a regular passenger car
translation.iHaveLargeCarOrBus: I have a large car or bus
translation.iHaveTruck: I have a truck (show delivery only)
translation.gdpr: This site uses cookies to allow the site to function. By agreeing, you give your consent for us to use them.
translation.gdpr1: Also, by agreeing, you accept the fact that this service is only an intermediary. It does not and cannot have any liability to you or to anyone else, either directly or indirectly. By agreeing, you assume any and all risks associated with the use of this site.
translation.gdpr2: We do not conduct any commercial activities and do not take any fees from the users of this service. All of this was created by people and for people and is delivered as is.
translation.gdpr3: We want to believe that soon there will be no room for hatred and pain in the world.
translation.needBigCarOrBus: Need a big car or bus
